title: Account Banned ?
body: So i havnt played in like a week and i went to log on today and it says banned? i no longer have access to the email that is linked to it. i mean im honor 4 and i dont get reported so why did this happen ive been playing. since season two and put alot of money into this game. ive only been chat banned one time so far since i had this game so i cant imagine that it was cause of reports. i just want my account back.

replies.body: It looks like someone might have issued a [**chargeback **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334-Chargebacks)on this account, in which case the money would have been refunded to your bank account and the account locked pending repayment. Reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can help you start the process to get your account unlocked.
Thank you. i put in a ticket and i called my bank and they said that it was suspicious so they counted it as fraud. really not happy with them right now
Dang banks trying to protect us when we don't want!!! -shakes rage fist-
do you know how long a response normally takes? i kinda only play on days off now sadly.

Typically billing tickets don't take too long, but it does depend on the current amount of tickets those agents have. I went ahead and checked up on the ticket you had, and you should get a response very shortly ^_^.
